review: I am so happy with my choice to buy an Amazon Fire TV stick.  I was disappointed that my 8 year old Sony Bravia HDTV set did not recognize the device.  Lucky for me, my 3 year old Denon video amplifier did.  This stick is amazing because it opens up a world of choices, including cable tv subscriptions like HBO and Showtime.  Music is stunning and sounds fantastic over my speakers system, since the Fire TV stick is plugged into the Denon unit, the sound is from the surround speaker array.  This Amazon Fire TV stick is a great choice for anybody that wants to say goodbye to the cable company.
author: Blake Griffin
